title: French Toast
ingredients: 1 tablespoon unsalted butter, or more as needed
method: Step 2: Whisk milk, eggs, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt together in a shallow bowl.
Step 3: Lightly butter a griddle or skillet and heat over medium-high heat. Dunk bread in the egg mixture, soaking both sides.
Step 4: Transfer to the hot skillet and cook until golden, 3 to 4 minutes per side.
